title: Public transport for the Warrnambool Racing Carnival: Thursday 6 May 2021
articleContent:
Public transport for the Warrnambool Racing Carnival: Thursday 6 May 2021

Passengers can take public transport to and from the Warrnambool Racing Carnival on Thursday 6 May 2021

Please check the Disruptions page for planned disruption information.

Regional coach

To Warrnambool:

  • An additional coach will depart Waurn Ponds at 8:17am, Colac 9:19am, Camperdown 9:54am, Terang 10:14am and arrive at Warrnambool Race Track at 11am. Passengers from Southern Cross will be able to travel on the 6:28am service to Waurn Ponds to connect with this special service. 

From Warrnambool:

  • An additional coach will depart Warrnambool Race Track at 5pm, Terang 5:46pm, Camperdown 6:06pm, Colac 6:41pm and arrive at Waurn Ponds at 7:43pm.

Plan your journey using Journey Planner.
articleDescription: Passengers can get public transport to and from the Warrnambool Racing Carnival on Thursday 6 May 2021
